attributes.action: Withhold financial support and cancel export credit guarantees with Israel and influence the rest of Europe to do likewise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Withhold financial support and cancel export credit guarantees with Israel and influence the rest of Europe to do likewise in view of the fact that they are contravening International Humanitarian and Criminal Law and not adhering to UN Resolutions in their Offensive war in Gaza

rejection.details: Some of your assertions have not been formally verified.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
